column5: Charming, bright one br suite with private bath and entrance. Pretty country setting with large deck out your door. Enjoy watching wildlife morning or evening on our spacious deck. Coffee, water and continental breakfast included. Relax and unwind. Midway between College Station and Brenham. Come see us for football games, Parents weekend, or any time you need to relax.
column8: HOWDY AGS! Snook House- Sunny, private 1 br suite
